answers.answer: Hello.  Most likely it is a nerve or circulation issue causing it, it is most likely inflamed or irritated.   It possibly is carpel tunnel, tendinitis, rheumatoid arthritis, or diabetes.  You might want to have your doctor check it.I Hope This Helps!

question: why am i getting a stinging pain in my lower right arm ,it lasts for 3/4 seconds and come in pulses of 2/3 every 5 mins its very stange .
title: stange pain
